py_sim.launch.grid_visualization module¶

grid_visualization.py: Provides a framework for visualization the occupancy grid

class py_sim.launch.grid_visualization.GridVisualization(n_inputs: int, plots: PlotManifest[UnicycleStateType], world: PolygonWorld, params: SimParameters[UnicycleStateType])¶

Bases: Generic[UnicycleStateType], SingleAgentSim[UnicycleStateType]

Framework for implementing a simulator that just tests out a feedback controller

update() → None¶

Calls all of the update functions * Calculate the control to be executed * Update the state * Update the time

py_sim.launch.grid_visualization.test_occupancy_grid() → None¶

Plots the occupancy grid on top of the world
